Name: HangTogether
About the game: HangTogether is a Online-Coop Hangman game that can also be played alone. Key Features Chill Ambient Music Huge (Over 50k) list of available words Play with up to 5 other players Local Player Statistics along with Steam Achievements Play against your friends in the Frenemies game mode. Mac support is planned for a future update.
